inference:
The slope of the line is $\frac{8.71-(-2.71)}{10-(-10)}=\frac{11.42}{20}=0.571$.  The equation of the line is $y-n=0.571(x-1001)$, so $y=0.571x-571.571+n$.  Since the line passes through the point $(1001,n)$, we have $n=0.571(1001)-571.571+n$, so $n=\boxed{0}$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{0}$. I hope it is correct.
